Posts.Content: Hi Lelotron, I felt exactly the same and desperately just wanted it all cut out and gone. My mind went into overdrive and I felt I had lumps and pains everywhere. I probably won’t be necessary for you either and we have to trust what we are told is best for us. I sailed through lumpectomy, node clearance, radiotherapy and now hormone therapy ( when I can find one to suit me). It’s a frightening journey , but you’ll do it and come through the other side... good luck and stay close to this site, the advice and support is wonderful ! Xx
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed with High Grade DCIS
